libICEpost.src.thermophysicalModels.specie.reactions
====================================================

.. py:module:: libICEpost.src.thermophysicalModels.specie.reactions

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   @author: F. Ramognino       <federico.ramognino@polimi.it>
   Last update:        01/02/2024

   Classes and packages for handling reactions in gaseous mixtures

   Content of the package:
       Reaction (package)
           Defines classes to model reactions

       ReactionModel (package)
           Defines classes to handel reaction of mixtures involving multiple simple reactions




Subpackages
-----------

   :maxdepth: 1
